thermocouple_type.docs:
Set the thermocouple type. Options are: K, J, T, N, S, E, B and R type thermocouple. Defaults to `K`.

*See also: [MCP9600 Thermocouple Amplifier](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp9600.html#configuration-variables)*

hot_junction.docs:
The information for the Hot Junction temperature sensor.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the temperature sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MCP9600 Thermocouple Amplifier](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp9600.html#configuration-variables)*

cold_junction.docs:
The information for the Cold Junction temperature sensor.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the temperature sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MCP9600 Thermocouple Amplifier](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp9600.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [MCP9600 Thermocouple Amplifier](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp9600.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x67`.

*See also: [MCP9600 Thermocouple Amplifier](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp9600.html#configuration-variables)*
